column5: This quiet, clean, comfortable room is in a new 3 bed/2 bath house. Vintage wood bed frame with full size bed and fresh bed linens. Comfortable easy chair and plenty of cozy blankets/pillows. Great study space with wooden desk and chair. For long-term renters, lots of storage space. Adjacent, (occasionally) shared bathrooms is clean with towels included. Fully equipped kitchen/living/dining room available for your use. Less than 10 minutes from the hospital; perfect for visiting students!
